alert.note: Alert for Camden; Hickory; Maries; Miller (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 1:19PM CST until January 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory this afternoon and evening, wet snow. Additional snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory Tuesday, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Camden, Hickory, Maries, and Miller Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
